import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams,Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import apiUrl from'../../apiConfig';import"./style.css";// Full blog view
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PostDetail=()=>{const{postId}=useParams();const[post,setPost]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const fetchPost=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("".concat(apiUrl,"/posts/").concat(postId));const data=await response.json();setPost(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching post:',error);navigate('/');}};fetchPost();},[postId,navigate]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:post?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"full-blog-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:post.content}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"btn btn-outline-primary",to:"/",children:"Back to Home"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."})});};export default PostDetail;
